name: vanilla.normal
description:
Normal is a collection of simple native classes that work with a normalized float (0.0 - 1.0). It features a number of event Actions for when it has become 0 ('empty') or 1 ('full') and several variants for specialized reasons.

Any 'eased' normal modifies the float with an easing algorithm before being invoked.

Any 'unsafe' normal does it's thing twice as fast as 'safe' variants - it achieves this by being sneaky with comparisons.

samples.description: Demonstrates some very basic implementations of Normal classes.
